entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries over southern sections. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
